title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the CodeReadabilityAnalyzer project, including the target audience, programming languages to support, readability metrics, and desired features.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Develop Code Analysis Engine
description: Implement the core code analysis engine that evaluates the readability of submitted code based on defined metrics and rules.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for submitting code, displaying analysis results, and providing improvement suggestions.

title: Implement Code Submission and Storage
description: Develop the functionality for securely receiving and storing submitted code for analysis.

title: Integrate Code Analysis Engine and User Interface
description: Integrate the code analysis engine with the user interface to provide a seamless experience for users.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the application follows best practices for security, including input validation, secure code storage, and user authentication.

title: Write Documentation and Tutorials
description: Create comprehensive documentation and tutorials to guide users on how to use the CodeReadabilityAnalyzer effectively.

title: Set up Testing and Continuous Integration
description: Establish a testing framework and continuous integration pipeline to ensure code quality and reliability.
dependencies: Integrate Code Analysis Engine and User Interface

title: Deploy and Monitor Application
description: Deploy the CodeReadabilityAnalyzer to a production environment and set up monitoring and logging systems.
dependencies: Set up Testing and Continuous Integration
